title: US President's Hand-Picked Board Votes To Rename To Trump-Kennedy Center | 10 News
description: America's famed Kennedy Centre apparently has a new name with the board of the institution voting to rebrand it as the Trump-Kennedy Centre after the current and former Presidents. title: Hundreds Of Surfers Pay Tribute In Paddle Out For Bondi Terror Attack Victims | 10 News
description: Moving scenes have played out at Bondi Beach this morning, with hundreds of surfers taking to the water in a paddle out for the victims of Sunday's massacre.  It’s one of many tributes continuing to play out in Sydney's east where Zoe Martin reports from. title: Seven Victorian Men Dramatically Arrested By Police Then Released In Sydney | 10 News
description: New details on that extraordinary take-down at Liverpool where seven men from Victoria were pulled from two cars at gunpoint, cuffed and detained.  They were extensively questioned by authorities quizzed about their ideologies and intentions while in Sydney.  But, despite the drama all men walked from the Police station this afternoon claiming the whole ordeal, was a case of mistaken identity. title: Anthony Albanese Announces National Gun Buyback Scheme In Wake Of Bondi Terror Attack | 10 News
description: Prime Minister Anthony Albanese has announced a national gun buyback scheme in the wake of the Sunday's terror attack.  The program is expected to cost a billion dollars with the states and territories to help foot the bill.  It's the largest buyback of its kind since the Port Arthur massacre nearly 30-years ago. title: Teenager’s High Court Challenge Of Under-16s Social Media Ban | 10 News+
description: It is now just over one week since the social media ban for under-16s came into effect. But the ban faces two High Court challenges, both claiming the regulation is unconstitutional.   One case is being led by two Sydney teenagers, backed by the Digital Freedom Project.   10 News+ speaks to one of the teen applicants, Noah Jones. title: Bondi Shooting Tribute, Australia’s Gun Buyback Scheme, Epstein Photos Released | 10’s Late News
description: Tonight on 10’s Late News – Questions are being raised over the actions of NSW Police after they were forced to release seven men arrested during a dramatic takedown in Western Sydney, a billion-dollar national gun buyback scheme will be established in the wake of the Bondi massacre, Queensland has been rocked by a brazen act of hate against the Muslim community, Sydney is starting to heal almost a week on from the Bondi terror attack, reclaiming the beach in a stunning show of solidarity, and Democrats in the US have released another batch of photographs as the deadline looms for the Epstein files to drop. title: Hephner The Alpaca Wins Volunteer Of The Year Award | 10 News+
description: The unlikely winner of the Calvary Bruce Hospital’s Volunteer of the Year award has been announced.   Hephner the Alpaca has travelled to almost every state and territory, raising about $30,000 for mental health charities and local families in need - making a difference through shear ‘wool’ power.
